about.title: About me
about.intro: Hi there! Allow me to introduce myself: my name is Janos, and I specialize in web development. Shaping the online world and enhancing user experiences is my passion. In this dynamic field, I utilize technologies such as JavaScript-based frontend and backend development, with a strong focus on React library.
about.journey: I embarked on my programming journey in 2 years ago, and I've been passionately improving my skills ever since. Python and the Django web framework are also in my toolkit, allowing me to create exciting and functional web applications.
about.tech: The world of information technology is constantly evolving, and I am open to exploring new opportunities. I Enjoy learning and tackling challenges to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies.

project.title: My Projects
project.intro: I showcase some of my projects on my website, most of which can be found on my GitHub. If you're curious about my code, visit my GitHub page. By clicking on the projects, you'll be redirected to their respective folders. Check them out; they involve a lot of effort.

form.title: Get in touch using the form
form.messagePlaceholder: Send a message to get started.
